properties.body:
ADRIATIC SEA.
ALBANIA.
DNC 09.
1. CABLE OPERATIONS 04 MAR TO 31 MAY BY M/V CASTOR 10,
   M/V OCEAN LINK, M/V MIMAR SINAN, AND
   M/V FRANCESCO DI GIORDIO
   IN AREA BETWEEN
   40-50.0N 019-10.2E, 40-50.0N 019-22.4E,
   40-42.5N 019-22.4E, 40-42.5N 019-10.2E.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 01 JUN 19.
